name: nnForge
tagline: Convolutional and fully-connected neural networks C++ library. It features CPU and GPU (CUDA) backends
body:
nnForge
=======

nnForge is a library for training convolutional and fully-connected neural networks. It includes CPU and GPU (CUDA) backends. nnForge is an open-source software distributed under the Apache License v2.0.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
